title: Can we get back Spectator Mode of High Elo games in the new client please?
body: I remember we were able to watch high elo games live in the legacy client, can we get this back? Also live chat or audio chat but not visible by the players would be so cool

replies.body: Profile > Ranked > Top X-queue Players > look for an eye symbol > rightclick and spectate

> [{quoted}](name=ﬂoo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T54MXvEf,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-03-16T20:08:49.496+0000)
>
> Profile > Ranked > Top X-queue Players > look for an eye symbol > rightclick and spectate

That's what I resort to, but the interface is so bad. I don't want to see a list of thousands of high-ranked players sorted by their rank; I want to spectate a match. The former requires scrolling through these lists and hunting for a live match (if there even is one).

Yup sure, it could be on the front page (instead of 8 different fucking esport topics which idgaf about).
But in this thread it looks like nobody knew it does exist in the new client in the first place.

Yeah, it doesn't help that it's buried in a place with nearly no other purpose. How often do people want to see that listing per se? Nothing tells the user that live matches occasionally show up there. I wouldn't be surprised if Riot is intentionally making it difficult to find and use so that people watch video streams instead, for tracking, ads, etc.

Well, considering there now are ads for featured streamers and especially esports, that is probably the truth. Just watch the pro play that gives them money instead of the pro play which is the closest to your average game which you can actually learn something from.

I'm not sure, since I never cared anyway, but can you even spectate a tournament game from the client with your own account? Not a stream online, but actually spectating the game by yourself.

Games in official tournaments overseen by Riot are played on a local network with its own server, so there's no way to spectate those through the client with an ordinary account.
Yet another reason why it's a biased design.. sad tbh they're catering way too much to pro play
Agreed. It was one of my favorite ways to kill some time while doing other stuff online.

I was thinking the same thing. I remembered it a few weeks ago. I was spectating a diamond friend when i remembered you used to be able to spectate high elo games. Lot of fun to watch and very educational.
miss that feature as well, now you have to resort to watch ugly ass ppl screaming the same shit every 5 seconds :)

They probably just to lazy to re-implement that because you can watch them on twitch. Don't necessarily agree, but I doubt we're ever getting it back. It was really nice to have control over camera while watching.
